import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import OwlCarousel from "react-owl-carousel"; import "../OwlCarousel2-2.3.4/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css"; import "../OwlCarousel2-2.3.4/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css"; import Cart from "./Cart"; import CourseService from "../Services/courseService"; import { FETCH_COURSES } from "../Store/Action/type"; import reduxAction from "../Store/Action/action"; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import React, { Component } from 'react' const courseService = new CourseService(); class MyCourse extends Component { componentDidMount() { courseService .layDanhSachKhoaHoc() .then(res => { this.props.dispatch(reduxAction(FETCH_COURSES, res.data)); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }); } render() { return (

); } } export default connect(MyCourse)
